info.name: BlueSky Custom Video/Image Background
info.description:
This is a frosted-glass style theme for Bluesky that allows you to substitute your own background image URL (animated gif, png, or jpeg). You can also change the theme accent color to match your background!

If you want to take it a step further, install the Violentmonkey extension and the following userscript to use a video (.mp4) as the background instead: https://gist.githubusercontent.com/ShrineFox/f3017d5847a61893eaee9bb4c7028a25/raw/68f52676dbe7825757ba583c9b770b8913ddd03b/video_background-userscript.js

For more detailed installation and customization steps, see my thread here:
https://bsky.app/profile/shrinefox.com/post/3k3ygg5iep724
info.additionalInfo:
Stylish wouldn't let me upload with the variables or the :not() selector, so here is the full theme code: 

https://gist.githubusercontent.com/ShrineFox/f3017d5847a61893eaee9bb4c7028a25/raw/68f52676dbe7825757ba583c9b770b8913ddd03b/bluesky-stylus-theme.css
